bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Benjamin F. Betts (b. 1888) was an architect and architectural critic. He was also the editor of the journal The American Architect.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seven blueprints with accompanying letters submitted by Benjamin F. Betts to The Architectural Review in 1915. The blueprints are for various homes in Rochester and West Henrietta, N.Y.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.
